Muhammad Bala Shagari (amụrụ na n'ubọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 1949) bụ onye isi ndị agha lara ezumike nka na Onye-isi-ọchịchị nke mpaghara gọọmentị obodo Shagari na Sokoto Steeti, Naijiria
O ji aha ọdịnala bụ Sarkin Mafara nke Shagari
Shagari bụ ọkpara onye isi ala gara aga bụ  Shehu Shagari nke nwunye ya bụ Hajiya Amina mụrụ
Amuru ya na obodo Shagari  na Sokoto Steeti   n’afo 1949
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu bụ Barewa kọleji, Zaria wee gaa  Ụlọ mmụta Nchebe Naịjirịa n'afọ 1975 ebe ọ bụ onye otu mgbe n'ezie nke iri na asatọ

Mgbe agha nke ọnwa Decemba nke afọ 1983 na Naijiria nke General Muhammadu Buhari duziri nke wepụrụ nna ya, ejidere ya obere oge ma mesịa jiri ike laa ya ezumike nká site na ndị agha Naijiria na-enweghị mmejọ na ọkwa nke Captain
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ndị agha n'afọ 1984, Muhammad Bala Shagari guzobere Shag Náijiria Limited, ma mechaa chọpụta Ụlo ọrụ Hamadah Shipping ya na Alhaji Aliko Dangote na Sen
Usman Albishir, tinyere ndị ọzọ, n'afọ 1989
Ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Ụlo ọrụ Hamadah Shipping n'oge ahụ.
Tupu Mba Naijiria nke atọ, ọ bụ onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Yabo, nke gụnyere gọọmentị obodo Yabo, Shagari na Tambuwal n'afọ 1988
Agbanyeghị naMba Naijiria nke atọ  abịaghị na mmezu n'ihi nkagbu nke ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Naijiria n'afọ 1993
Emechara, họpụta ya dịka onye ntụzi-aka nke Nkwenye ndị ọrụ ugbo Naijiria na ụlọ akụ mmepe ime obodo (NACB) n'afọ 1993.
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke mbadamba eletrik Ime obodo nke Sokoto Steeti na kansụl nke egwuregwu na Sokoto Steeti n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha gawa n'ihu na Steeti
n'afọ 1997, mgbe Shagari mechara bụrụ Gọọmenti Obodo, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye Isi nchịkwa mpaghara nke Shagari site n’aka Sultan Muhammadu Maccido
N’afọ 2009, ọ  bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ikpe na Federal Capital Territory
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu ndị nlekọta nke PZ Cusons Foundation, onye otu ego ntụkwasị obi nke mmụta na Sokoto steeti, na onye otu otu ndị gọvanọ nke  Aduvie International Schools.
Muhammad Bala Shagari lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụ asatọ
Otu n’ime ha bụ onye ndu ndị ntorobịa bụ Bello Bala Shagari
Ya onwe ya bu ọkpara nwa onye isi ala Shehu Shagari
Mallam Shagari bụ onye egwuregwu Polo na-anụ ọkụ n’obi na otu onye isi otu egwuregwu Polo nke Zaria
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Iko Georgian ama ama nke otu Polo nke Kaduna
Dịka onye hụrụ egwuregwu n'anya, ọ na-egwuri egwu ise, ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Fives Federation na Naijiria
